channel.title: tutorials on inSileco
channel.description: Recent content in tutorials on inSileco

item.title: Our Software
item.description: diskers [R package]    Collection of seed dispersal kernels written in Rcpp. geographr [R package]    An R package to test your skills in world geography. graphicsutils [R package]    Collection of graphics functions. inSilecoMisc [R package]    Miscelleneous R functions. orthomap [R package]    Bug fix for map using orthographic projection. rchelsa [R package]    An R package to download chelsa data. rcites [R package]    Access information from the Speciesplus database rcrosswords [R package]    An R package to generate crossword grids.

item.title: Our tutorials
item.description: Short R tutorials About R Markdown (2018) Learn how to use R Markdown. About R packages (2018) A short tutorial to learn how to created an R package. Maps with R (2018) Learn how to turn R into a powerful GIS software. Long-form R tutorials Utiliser R Markdown (2022) A long-form guide to master R Markdown. R in Space (2018) A long-form guide to use R as a GIS.
